name: DoubleDuck
description:
A game made in less than 24h during the 2018 BBQ GameJam in Metz by :

  • Franck Jeandinot (Twitter) : arts, music, sfx
  • Cyrille Bonard (Twitter) : development

How many ducks can you take in a fight ?

Let's settle this now !

Double Duck is a fighting game for one or two players inspired by the classics brawlers of the 16 bit era.
